Citizen.contextDescription: The citizen being checked for this demographic.
The citizen being checked for this demographic.

civics.name: Regulated Oil Drilling
civics.description:
Oil drilling is administered by the Federal Government:
- only the MoI and PM may place pumpjacks
- only holders of the Federal Oil Driller title may start work orders at pumpjacks
- oil drilling labour is split equally between all oil drilling specialists
- petroleum is distributed according to contributed oil drilling labour, equal reserves for the first 12 hours after crafting

Uses 5 custom stats:
- global 'oilorders' to track cumulative labour requested
- per user 'oillabour' to track labour contributed
- per user 'oilshare' to track petroleum allocated
- global 'oilproduced' to track produced petroleum
- per user 'oilbought' to track purchased petroleum not from the reserve (total for White Tiger)
- per user 'oilresbought' to track purchased petroleum from the left-over reserve (total for White Tiger)

Command !oilinfo lists labour limits and purchase limits

properties.Title: Oil Drilling Tracking
properties.UserDescription:
Oil drillers may only contribute a limited amount of oil drilling labour, based on the number of oil drilling professionals
When contributing oil drilling labour, it is tracked in custom stats:
- increase oillabour by the contributed amount, blocked if limit is reached
- increase allocated oilshare for buying petroleum
Labour payout is done according to the Federal Oil Drilling Payout acocunt holdings

properties.Title: Oil Order Tracking
properties.UserDescription:
When posting an oil order, update oilorders stat (cannot track labour requested - has to be calculated from orders)
Active oil drillers are notified when new work orders are created.
Only holders of the Federal OIl Driller title may post new oil drilling orders

LeftNumber.contextDescription: The total number of items to be created.

properties.Message: new oil drilling work orders have been created at Federal OIl Pumpjacks

LocationToDisplay.contextDescription: The position where the interaction took place.

properties.Title: Oil Sales Tracking
properties.UserDescription:
When buying petroleum
- a maximum of petroleum equivalent to the labour contributed may be bought (tracked via oilshare)
- the petroleum produced in the last 12 hours is equally distributed between oil drillers (tracked via oilproduced and oilbought)

Location.contextDescription: The position where the interaction took place.
The position where the interaction took place.

properties.Title: Federal Oil Payout Protection
properties.UserDescription: Prevent transfers to the payout account from non-government members to prevent payout abuse.

Citizen.contextDescription: The citizen who transfered the money. Note: Can only be taxed if they are a citizen of the settlement of the law executing.

properties.Title: Oil Drilling Info Command
properties.UserDescription:
Use chatcommand !oilinfo to obtain
- contributed oil drilling labour
- contribution limit for oil drilling labour
- Petroleum buy limit based on oil labour contributed
- Petroleum buy limit based on Petroleum produced (reserved for user + freed-up reserve)
